name: Karat
description: Karat created the world’s first Interviewing Cloud to solve the multi-decade global shortage of software engineers. The Interviewing Cloud is an always-on, scalable, and consistent human + technology solution for conducting predictive, fair, and enjoyable technical interviews 24/7. Karat’s global network of Interview Engineers, unparalleled market intelligence, and purpose-built interviewing infrastructure opens the pipeline for engineering talent, limits pedigree bias, and provides access for underrepresented candidates. The fastest growing and largest enterprises such as Roblox, American Express, Intuit, Compass, and Wayfair trust Karat to expand hiring capacity, unlock developer time, and raise engineering quality so they can innovate and grow.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity

Headline: We’re Karat, the world’s largest interviewing company
ShortDescription: Karat help companies hire top engineering talent by improving the quality, efficiency, and equity of their technical hiring process. When every interview is predictive, fair and enjoyable, we can work together to unlock opportunity — for everyone.

Highlights.name: Karat helps businesses hire qualified engineers
Highlights.description: Karat assists businesses in finding and recruiting qualified engineers by providing various services throughout the technical interviewing process.

Highlights.name: Variety of services for technical interviewing:
Highlights.description: Karat offers a comprehensive approach to technical interviewing. Their services include interview scheduling, candidate evaluation, and data analysis, ensuring a smooth and efficient hiring process.

Highlights.name: Improved hiring outcomes for clients
Highlights.description: Clients using Karat's services report benefits like saving time and improving the quality of their engineering hires. This suggests Karat's services can significantly enhance a company's recruitment process.
